Name: Deep Well
Texts:
'This rabbit hole is dark. I can barely see where I am going'
	'Oops!'
You Are falling into a well! 
On the walls of the well are cupboards and shelves.
On top of a cupboard, you see a jar:
And is that a map hanging on the wall?
You can drop any item anywhere since you have a capacity to carry only three.
Boom! You land on a floor. The landing is not as smooth as the flight here :-(
